sentences.en: After that, I played volleyball with my friends.
sentences.cn: 在此之后，我打排球和我的朋友。

sentences.en: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.cn: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

sentences.en: Do you like volleyball?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢打排球吗？

sentences.en: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.cn: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.en: I dropped my watch while I was playing volleyball.
sentences.cn: 当我打排球时,把表掉在了地上.

sentences.en: I have a volleyball , But he one.
sentences.cn: 我没有排球，但他有一个。

sentences.en: I have three tickets for the volleyball match this evening.
sentences.cn: 我有三张今天晚上的排球比赛门票.

sentences.en: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.en: In playing volleyball you have the advantage of being tall.
sentences.cn: 你个子高,打排球占便宜.

sentences.en: John is a member of the school volleyball team.
sentences.cn: 约翰是学校排球队队员.

sentences.en: Neither volleyball nor basketball is a hundred years old.
sentences.cn: 排球和篮球都不到一百年的历史.

sentences.en: The children are playing volleyball on the lawn.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在草地上打排球.

sentences.en: The style of the Chinese Women's Volleyball Team in a competition is indomitable, bold and vigorous.
sentences.cn: 中国女排比赛时,作风顽强, 大胆泼辣.

sentences.en: The women's volleyball team put up a desperate fight to win the world championship at all costs.
sentences.cn: 女子排球队为赢得世界冠军而不惜一切代价,殊死拼搏.

sentences.en: They are fond of playing volleyball.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢打排球.

sentences.en: They didn't play volleyball near the window. They were afraid of breaking it.
sentences.cn: 他们没在窗子附近打排球, 他们怕把窗子打破了.

sentences.en: They will go to the zoo or play volleyball.
sentences.cn: 他们要去动物园或打排球.

sentences.en: Valerie earned letters in three sports: volleyball, basketball, and field hockey.
sentences.cn: 瓦莱丽在排球、篮球和曲棍球三个项目上获得了佩戴校名首字母标志的荣誉。

sentences.en: Volleyball is a sport of which I am very fond.
sentences.cn: 排球是我很喜欢的运动.

sentences.en: We are going to play neither basketball nor volleyball.
sentences.cn: 我们既不将打篮球也不将打排球.

sentences.en: We went for an outing that included a picnic and a volleyball game.
sentences.cn: 我们出去做了一次包括野餐和排球比赛的远足.

trans.tran_en: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net
